description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Sweet Potato Pizza Base recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pizza dough,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Gluten-Free Sweet Potato Pizza Base Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large sweet potato, peeled, cut into 2cm cubes (approx. 750g)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Spread sweet potato onto prepared tray and spray with olive oil. Season. Bake for 20 minutes or until soft. Transfer to a bowl and mash. Reline baking tray with baking paper and increase oven temperature to 240°C.

Combine chia and 2 tbs cold water in a bowl. Set aside for 10 minutes to thicken. Add to mashed sweet potato with flour and almond meal. Stir until a soft dough forms. Knead gently until smooth. Using your hands, press mixture out to a 26cm circle on prepared tray. Brush with oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until edges are crisp.
